channel.title: I can't die in Black Mesa.
channel.description: When I got to surface tension couldn't die. All the soldiers started to kill me. They kept shooting at me but I couldn't die. It became almost too easy. Can someone help me?:jizz:

item.title: I can't die in Black Mesa.
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
Madman809:

Did I also mention I entered cheat codes earlier?

lol

Read full topic
item.source: I can't die in Black Mesa.

item.title: I can't die in Black Mesa.
item.dc:creator: Madman809
item.description:
Maxey:

It doesn’t disable the cheat codes themselves, just whether or not you’re allowed to use them.

So what you need to do is enable cheat usage with sv_cheats 1, type either god or buddha to enable or disable those cheat codes and then type sv_cheats 0 if you don’t want to type in any more cheat codes. You can leave that on 1 and still have all cheats disabled.

It acts like a door.

Okay it works. Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't die in Black Mesa.

item.title: I can't die in Black Mesa.
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
For the record, sv_cheats is reset every time you start the game, but not reset if you load another save where it wasn’t on. god and buddha mode (+ things like noclip and notarget) don’t reset, but don’t carry over to other savegames. So if you save a game where god mode is on, god mode will stay on in that save game until you turn it off (if you reload that save you’ll need to turn it off again, but if you turn it off and save, it’ll stay off in the new save).

Also, when sv_cheats is set to 1 and you type in god or buddha for the first time, you’ll get a message in the console under it saying “god mode ON…” or “buddha mode ON…l”. If you type it again, you’ll get “god mode OFF…” or “buddha mode OFF…”, which is what you’ll be looking for here.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't die in Black Mesa.

item.title: I can't die in Black Mesa.
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
It doesn’t disable the cheat codes themselves, just whether or not you’re allowed to use them.

So what you need to do is enable cheat usage with sv_cheats 1, type either god or buddha to enable or disable those cheat codes and then type sv_cheats 0 if you don’t want to type in any more cheat codes. You can leave that on 1 and still have all cheats disabled.

It acts like a door.

item.title: I can't die in Black Mesa.
item.dc:creator: Madman809
item.description:
amazingcomedy:

Yep, just enter buddha or god mode in again…although I don’t see why you’re complaining about immortality

Well, that’s a question I used to ask myself until I realized it was a video game and I want it too be challenging.

And it won’t quite work. Sorry.

Read full topic
